successes.title: The Lomography Smartphone Film Scanner
successes.description: The Smartphone Film Scanner Offers You a New Way to Instantly Scan and Share 35mm Films Using Your Smartphone.

Pledges.description: As a loyal supporter, we’ll send you a set of Lomography Shutter Buttons and bunch of funny Lomographs as thanks.
Thanks for supporting us! We’ll reward you with a Lomography Keychain, a set of Lomography Shutter Buttons and bunch of funny Lomographs as a heart-felt thanks.

Get the Smartphone Film Scanner for a special launch price. Only 333 available. You'll receive the Smartphone Film Scanner as well as the amazing World Box Supreme set including all the greatest Lomography cameras, 5 packs of film and accessories. Includes the Lomo LC-A+, Diana F+, Fisheye No. 2, Supersampler, Fisheye Baby 110 Metal, Oktomat, Actionsampler and Colorsplash. Also includes 4 lenses for the Diana F+, the Diana 35mm Back, the Colorsplash and Fritz the Blitz flashes, the LC-A+ Wide-Angle Lens and a Sidekick Canvas Bag to keep it all safe and stylish. A truly deluxe Lomographic experience! Only 5 available. Shipping and Tax Information: USA = Free Shipping (Customers in California, Illinois, Texas and New York: We will contact you for Sales Tax). Europe = Please add $50 to cover Shipping and VAT. Rest of World = Please add $10 to cover Shipping (Import Duties Not Included).

A once-in-a-lifetime trip to Lomography Headquarters. We'll treat you to 5 days and 5 nights in a great hotel. For 2 days of the trip, we will offer the complete Lomographic experience. You'll go on a trip to a traditional Viennese market searching for negatives with Lomography staff, visit Lomography HQ, build your very own LomoWall and have a night out partying with us too. And that's just the start...during your stay, you will be able to pick the leather design on your very own, one-of-a-kind customized Lomo LC-A+ camera. Of course you would also get your very own Smartphone Film Scanner too! Please Note: The time of this trip should be agreed on by both parties; you would be responsible for covering flight costs. Only 10 available.

The ultimate Lomography trip. Firstly, we'll treat you to 5 nights in a hotel in Vienna. You will visit a traditional Viennese market to search for negatives, spend time at Lomography HQ and build your very own LomoWall. Then we will fly you to Moscow for a trip back to the roots of Lomography accompanied by one of the Lomography founders who'll show you Russia through their eyes. We'll arrange 5 nights in a hotel for you. In Moscow, you will spend 2 days with a special Lomography program and we will organize trips for you to meet some amazing contemporary Russian artists. Of course you will also get your very own Smartphone Film Scanner too! Please Note: The time of this trip should be agreed on by both parties; we will cover the flights from Vienna to Moscow and back again and hotel costs in both Vienna and Moscow. You would pay for flights to Vienna and back home again to start and end the trip.
